transcript:
mopping himself with his handkerchief, sat 
idown by Natdsha and did not leave her for the rest of the evening. 
FOR TWO DAYS after that Rost6v did not see D61okhov at his own or at D61okhov's home: on the third day he received a note from him: 
As I do not intend to be at your house again for reasons you know of, and am going to rejoin my regiment, I am giving a farewell supper tonight to my friendscome to the English Hotel. 
About ten o'clock Rost6v went to the English Hotel straight from t
